pkgmetadata.longdescription: # laz-rs-pythonPython bindings for the [laz-rs](https://crates.io/crates/laz) crate.# BuildingBuilding is done by using [maturin](https://github.com/PyO3/maturin)```console# from pypipip install lazrs# localypip install .```or```consolepip install maturinmaturin develop --release```
